history.title: About Casino de Mont-Tremblant
history.description2: Casino de Mont-Tremblant is a modern gaming and entertainment destination nestled in Quebec’s Laurentian Mountains. It offers a wide selection of slot machines, classic table games, and poker, complemented by fine dining at Altitude restaurant and vibrant live entertainment. With stunning mountain views, convenient shuttle service, and exclusive VIP areas, it’s a unique blend of luxury, excitement, and natural beauty.

customHtml.title: The best casino in Mont Tremblant: entertainment and jackpots
customHtml.description:
Casino de Mont‑Tremblant is a modern gaming and entertainment destination in Quebec’s Laurentian Mountains, located on the Versant Soleil slope of Tremblant Resort. Getting there is easy with a free shuttle and gondola from the pedestrian village, plus convenient parking and valet service.


Inside, you’ll find hundreds of slot machines, blackjack, roulette, baccarat tables, and poker formats. Progressive jackpots and big prizes are a major draw—monthly payouts exceed $8.6 million, with daily wins reaching $17,000.


The culinary highlight is Altitude Restaurant, offering panoramic mountain views and live music, while Bar Central serves cocktails and hosts DJ nights and themed parties. The event calendar includes live shows and seasonal celebrations.


Although the casino has no on-site hotel, Tremblant Resort offers boutique hotels, condos, and chalets nearby, all connected by shuttle. Regular guests can enjoy the Casino Privilèges loyalty program with bonuses, cashback, and exclusive perks.


Casino de Mont‑Tremblant combines gaming, fine dining, and entertainment in a unique mountain setting.


Casino de Mont-Tremblant Visitor Rules

  • • Age Requirement: Guests must be 18 years or older to enter.
  • • Dress Code: No strict dress code, but neat attire is required (beachwear and sportswear are not allowed).
  • • ID Check: A valid photo ID is required at entry.
  • • Smoking Policy: The casino is completely smoke-free; smoking is prohibited indoors.
  • • Photography & Video: Allowed only in designated areas.
  • • Baggage Policy: Large bags and suitcases must be left in the cloakroom.
  • • Responsible Gaming: The casino follows Responsible Gambling guidelines and may refuse service for rule violations.

Casino Privilèges Loyalty Program at Casino de Mont-Tremblant

Unlock exclusive rewards with Casino Privilèges, the official loyalty program at Casino de Mont-Tremblant. Every time you play slots, table games, or dine at our restaurants, you earn points that can be redeemed for gaming credits, discounts, and special perks.


The program offers four membership tiers: Privilèges, Privilèges Plus, Prestige, and Prestige Plus. As you move up, you gain access to premium benefits like priority service, VIP lounge access, and personalized offers.


Enjoy 15% discounts at Altitude Restaurant and Bar Central, plus special promotions such as Double Points Tuesdays. Members also receive exclusive invitations to events, seasonal offers, and hotel & spa discounts at partner properties like Fairmont Le Manoir Richelieu and Hilton Lac-Leamy.


Sign up for free and start earning rewards today. With progressive jackpots, personalized bonuses, and a world-class gaming experience, Casino Privilèges makes every visit more rewarding.


Status levels:

  • • Privilèges (Basic) — starts upon registration.
  • • Privilèges Plus — approximately $1,600 in slot play over 12 months.
  • • Prestige — around $35,000 in play.
  • • Prestige Plus — top tier, requires about $400,000 in annual play.

Use the Casino Privileges card when playing slots, tables and restaurants. Points can be exchanged for game credits, discounts, and gifts.

Benefits for members

  • • 15% discounts at restaurants (including Altitude and Bar Central) and on show tickets.
  • • Exclusive promotions: double points every Tuesday from 12:00 PM to 4:00 PM.
  • • Personalized offers: for high-level players — access to VIP lounges and special event invitations.
  • • Hotels and spas: discounts on stays at Fairmont Le Manoir Richelieu and Hilton Lac-Leamy, as well as on Moment Spa services.

customHtml_2.title: Casino de Mont‑Tremblant: Gaming, Bars, Hotels, and Bonuses
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses and Promotions

Jackpots and Winnings

  • • Progressive Jackpots: Powerbucks and other network jackpots can reach millions of dollars.
  • • Daily Wins: Slot payouts can go up to $17,000, and total monthly prizes exceed $8.6 million. .

Special Offers

  • • Seasonal Promotions: Themed parties like Halloween, prize draws up to $10,000, and mystery prizes up to $60,000.
  • • Group Packages: Special deals for tour groups and corporate events.
  • • Online Bonus: $25 welcome bonus for new players on the Loto-Québec platform.

Popular games at Casino de Mont-Tremblant


Slots

The casino offers over 400–500 slot machines, featuring both classic and modern video slots. Popular titles include Huff N’ Even More Puff™, Lion Link™, and Rakin Bacon! Sahara™, many of which feature progressive jackpots worth hundreds of thousands of dollars. Themes range from Wild West and jungle adventures to mystical and fantasy-inspired designs, with bonus rounds and big payout potential.


Electronic Tables

For those who prefer a digital experience, the casino offers electronic versions of roulette, blackjack, and baccarat—perfect for beginners or players who enjoy a more private setting.


Table Games

Guests can enjoy classic favorites like Blackjack (including Free Bet Blackjack and Blackjack Switch), Roulette (American and European versions), and Baccarat. Poker fans will find Ultimate Texas Hold’em, Three-Card Poker, and Mississippi Stud Poker, where payouts can reach up to 500x your bet.



Special Features

Progressive jackpots such as Powerbucks are available on select slots and poker side bets. Minimum bets typically start at C$5–C$20 for table games and around $10 for poker.


Minimum and Maximum Bets at Casino de Mont-Tremblant

Knowing the betting limits helps you plan your gaming experience. Here are the typical minimum and maximum bets for the most popular games at Casino de Mont-Tremblant:


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines C$0.01 – C$1 C$100+
Roulette C$5 C$500
Blackjack C$10 C$500
Baccarat C$20 C$1,000
Poker (Ultimate Texas Hold’em) C$10 C$100 per bet

Events and Entertainment at Casino de Mont-Tremblant

Casino de Mont-Tremblant is more than just a gaming destination—it’s a vibrant entertainment hub in the heart of Quebec’s Laurentian Mountains. Guests can enjoy a variety of live shows, themed parties, and seasonal events, making every visit unique.


Regular Entertainment

Experience live music every Friday and Saturday at Altitude Restaurant, where panoramic views meet fine dining. Sundays feature a relaxing brunch with live piano music, perfect for a laid-back start to the day. For nightlife lovers, Bar Central hosts Party Mix Nights with DJs spinning until late, creating an energetic atmosphere. Comedy fans can enjoy free stand-up shows every Thursday at Le Sommet, featuring local talents. For beginners, The Zone offers an interactive gaming space with low stakes and a fun, social vibe.

Special Events and Shows

Casino de Mont-Tremblant hosts seasonal celebrations and themed parties, such as the popular Halloween Party with costume contests and prizes. Guests can also look forward to exclusive prize draws, mystery jackpots, and bonus point promotions throughout the year. Private and corporate events can be arranged with tailored packages, making the casino a top choice for group entertainment.

Why It’s Unique

The casino is integrated into Tremblant Resort’s cultural calendar, which includes major festivals like the Tremblant International Blues Festival, Les Rythmes Tremblant, and winter holiday celebrations. This means your casino visit can easily be combined with world-class music, gastronomy, and outdoor activities.


Dining, Bars, and Relaxation at Casino de Mont-Tremblant

Casino de Mont-Tremblant offers more than gaming—it’s a complete entertainment experience with fine dining, vibrant bars, and easy access to top hotels in Tremblant Resort.

Restaurants and Bars

The highlight is Altitude Seafood and Grill, a gourmet restaurant with panoramic mountain views, specializing in fresh seafood and premium grilled dishes. Guests can enjoy live music on Fridays and Saturdays and a relaxing Sunday Brunch with piano melodies. For cocktails and nightlife, Bar Central is the go-to spot, hosting Party Mix Nights with DJs every weekend. For a more intimate vibe, Axe Lounge Bar serves signature drinks and light bites in a cozy setting.

Hotels Near the Casino

While the casino does not have its own hotel, it’s surrounded by excellent accommodations within Tremblant Resort. Options include Residence Inn by Marriott Mont Tremblant Manoir Labelle, Holiday Inn Express & Suites Tremblant, and L’Altitude by Rendez-Vous Tremblant, all located within 2 km. For a luxury stay, Le Grand Lodge Mont Tremblant offers a lakeside setting, spa services, and the famous Whisky Bar.

Relaxation and Entertainment

Beyond gaming, Casino de Mont-Tremblant features live music, DJ nights, stand-up comedy shows, and themed parties like Halloween celebrations. Guests can also enjoy The Zone, an interactive gaming area with low stakes and a social atmosphere—perfect for beginners. Combine your casino visit with Tremblant’s outdoor activities, spas, and seasonal festivals for a truly unforgettable experience.

items.title: Do I need to register to enter the casino?
items.answer: No registration is required for entry, but you need to sign up for the Casino Privilèges loyalty program to enjoy member benefits.

items.title: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: The casino accepts cash (CAD), debit cards, and casino chips. Credit cards cannot be used for gaming.

items.title: Can I use foreign currency?
items.answer: No, all transactions are in Canadian dollars (CAD). Currency exchange is available at the cashier.

items.title: What languages are spoken at the casino?
items.answer: The main languages are French and English, and staff members are bilingual.

items.title: Is there free transportation to the casino?
items.answer: Yes. A free shuttle connects the casino to Tremblant’s pedestrian village, and the Versant Soleil gondola provides direct access.
